sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Container,Card,Button,Row,Col,Navbar,NavbarBrand, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter} from 'reactstrap'; import "../App.css" class MainPage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { modal: false }; this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); } toggle() { this.setState(prevState => ({ modal: !prevState.modal })); } componentDidMount(){ this.props.fetchMeds() } render() { console.log(this.props.medInfo) return (
Modal title {' '} {/* */} { this.props.medInfo && this.props.medInfo.map( med =>

Medication: {med.medication}


Quontity: {med.quantity}

Date Written: {med.dateWritten}

Directions: {med.directions}
Refills: {med.refills}
Expired: {med.expired}
Day Supply: {med.daySupply}
Doctor: {med.doctor}
 )}
) } } export default MainPage
